https://tmrev.io/movie/776519-Ailey 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kP50qRVwjTRNjmqGRxhM9mCR345.jpg Alvin Ailey was a visionary artist who found salvation through dance. Told in his own words and through the creation of a dance inspired by his life, this immersive portrait follows a man who, when confronted by a world that refused to embrace him, determined to build one that would. Ailey
